H0.text: Whose single I saw mommy kissing Santa Claus sold three million copies in 1952 . Bing Crosby

H3.text: Whose single I saw mommy kissing Santa Claus sold three million copies in 1952 . JIMMY BOYD

A4.text: I Saw Mommy Kissing Santa Claus was first recorded by American singer Jimmy Boyd in 1952.

A5.text: I Saw Mommy Kissing Santa Claus was performed by Jimmy Boyd on The Ed Sullivan Show (December 13, 1953).
